attributes.action: Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: We think the sanctions against Russia, Putin and his regime were inadequate in 2014 after Putin's annexation of Crimea. If NATO forces will not support Ukraine through military action, then sever all economic ties with Russia. Sanctioning a few oligarchs is not enough.
attributes.background: Impose a full embargo on Russian goods including gold, platinum, refined petroleum, gas, fertilizer and all other vital raw materials and resources that Russia's economy is built upon. If NATO forces will not support Ukraine through military action, then peaceful, economic action must be taken.
